body:
The following code cannot be compiled using `Cython==0.28.4` and `sys.version_info(major=3, minor=6, micro=1, releaselevel='final', serial=0)` on mac OS 10.13.5 and Ubuntu 18.04. I have not yet tested other python versions or operating systems.

```cython
# distutils: language=c++

from libcpp.map cimport map as cpp_map
from cython cimport numeric

def example(numeric a):
    cdef:
        cpp_map[numeric, int] _example
    return 0
```

The resulting error message is

```
Error compiling Cython file:
------------------------------------------------------------
...
from libcpp.map cimport map as cpp_map
from cython cimport numeric

def example(numeric a):
    cdef:
        cpp_map[numeric, int] _example
               ^
------------------------------------------------------------

/Users/till/.ipython/cython/_cython_magic_801cb407e37990af5549d259d10c716a.pyx:9:16: Compiler crash in AnalyseDeclarationsTransform

ModuleNode.body = StatListNode(_cython_magic_801cb407e37990af5549d259d10c716a.pyx:4:0)
StatListNode.stats[2] = DefNode(_cython_magic_801cb407e37990af5549d259d10c716a.pyx:7:0,
    has_fused_arguments = True,
    modifiers = [...]/0,
    name = 'example',
    np_args_idx = [...]/0,
    num_required_args = 1,
    py_wrapper_required = True,
    reqd_kw_flags_cname = '0')
FusedCFuncDefNode.stats[0] = DefNode(_cython_magic_801cb407e37990af5549d259d10c716a.pyx:7:0,
    modifiers = [...]/0,
    name = 'example',
    np_args_idx = [...]/0,
    num_required_args = 1,
    py_wrapper_required = True,
    reqd_kw_flags_cname = '0',
    specialized_signature_string = 'short')
File 'Nodes.py', line 427, in analyse_declarations: StatListNode(_cython_magic_801cb407e37990af5549d259d10c716a.pyx:8:4,
    is_terminator = True)
File 'Nodes.py', line 1322, in analyse_declarations: CVarDefNode(_cython_magic_801cb407e37990af5549d259d10c716a.pyx:9:8,
    modifiers = [...]/0,
    visibility = 'private')
File 'Nodes.py', line 1153, in analyse: TemplatedTypeNode(_cython_magic_801cb407e37990af5549d259d10c716a.pyx:9:16)

Compiler crash traceback from this point on:
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 1153, in analyse
    self.type = base_type.specialize_here(self.pos, template_types)
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py", line 3674, in specialize_here
    return self.specialize(dict(zip(self.templates, template_values)))
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py", line 3692, in specialize
    specialized.scope = self.scope.specialize(values, specialized)
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Symtab.py", line 2473, in specialize
    entry.type.specialize(values),
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py", line 415, in specialize
    base_type = self.typedef_base_type.specialize(values)
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py", line 3692, in specialize
    specialized.scope = self.scope.specialize(values, specialized)
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Symtab.py", line 2483, in specialize
    utility_code=e.utility_code)
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Symtab.py", line 2421, in declare_cfunction
    cname=cname, visibility=visibility)
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Symtab.py", line 2385, in declare_var
    entry.func_cname = "%s::%s" % (self.type.empty_declaration_code(), cname)
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py", line 51, in empty_declaration_code
    self._empty_declaration = self.declaration_code('')
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py", line 3746, in declaration_code
    for param in template_params
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py", line 3747, in <listcomp>
    if not is_optional_template_param(param) and not param.is_fused]
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py", line 1579, in declaration_code
    return self.const_base_type.declaration_code("const %s" % entity_code, for_display, dll_linkage, pyrex)
  File "/Users/till/miniconda3/envs/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py", line 1646, in declaration_code
    raise Exception("This may never happen, please report a bug")
Exception: This may never happen, please report a bug
```

The error only occurs when the fused type is used as the key, i.e. the following code compiles fine.

```cython
# distutils: language=c++

from libcpp.map cimport map as cpp_map
from cython cimport numeric

def example(numeric a):
    cdef:
        cpp_map[int, numeric] _example
    return 0
```

cc @sebewert

comment_data.body: This may be related to #1772 because the stack trace of the compiler trace goes through the `CConstType` class [here](https://github.com/cython/cython/blob/3f7a0302c0b1e66071840aa4a01f9f67d2a488c4/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py#L1579).

title: Compiler crashes when fused type is used as the key of a C++ map
